tool_description: Thousands of hilarious dad jokes for your entertainment apps. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/dadjokes
name: Dad Jokes by API-Ninjas
title: Dad Jokes by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/dadjokes
api_list.description: API Ninjas Dad Jokes API endpoint. Returns one (or more) random dad jokes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many jokes to return. Must be between 1 and 10. Default is 1.
